类 BEScrollBarUI.WindowsArrowButton

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    封闭类:
    BEScrollBarUI

    protected class BEScrollBarUI.WindowsArrowButton
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicArrowButton
    WindowsArrowButton is used for the buttons to position the document up/down. It differs from BasicArrowButton in that the preferred size is always a square.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
